translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 嫁達は何も答えなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The wives did not answer anything.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「たっだいまー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm back!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「折女、首尾は？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Orihime, how did it go?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 常に脳天気な空気を漂わせる折女が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Orihime, who usually gives off a carefree vibe,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日ばかりは沈痛げに首を横に振った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: for once today, shook her head sorrowfully.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「せめて、なんとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At least, I wanted somehow

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 話し合いに持ち込みたかったけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to bring it to a negotiation... but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それすら……って感じ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even that was... kind of impossible."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本当、ごめんよ、政さん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Really, I'm sorry, Masa-san..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、よくやってくれた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, you did well."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まさか『あの方』が復活されるとは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I never thought 'that person' would be resurrected..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「JAPANは妖怪軍で守る予定だったのに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We had planned to defend JAPAN with the youkai army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 妖怪の半数があの方について
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but half of the youkai sided with that person,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 内部分裂しちゃったのは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and caused an internal split..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、痛いよねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, that's painful, isn't it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「厳しい、ですよね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's harsh, isn't it...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの方への警戒も必要だから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We also need to be cautious of that person,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実質二面作戦になっちゃいました……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so it's basically a two-front battle now..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「せめて和解さえ出来れば……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If only we could at least reconcile...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの馬鹿犬」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That stupid mutt."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「できなかったことを悔やんでも仕方あるまい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There's no use regretting what couldn't be done."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺達は大陸に渡った香様に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We were entrusted by Kaoru-sama, who crossed the continent,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 留守を任された身」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to look after things in her absence."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それにこの戦い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Moreover, in this battle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もはや妖怪も無関係ではない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the youkai are no longer uninvolved."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今の戦力で戦うしかあるまい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We have no choice but to fight with our current forces."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……政宗のいるところが、我のいる場所」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Where Masamune is, that is where I belong."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前が進むのなら我も共に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you advance, I will go with you,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前が退くのなら我も共に」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if you retreat, I will also retreat with you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ずっと……ずっと共にいようぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let's stay together... always together."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「妖怪の方々だけに戦わせるつもりはありませんよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't intend to let only the youkai fight."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「五十六殿」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Gojuuroku."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わあ、戦装束、久しぶりに見ました！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wow, it's been a long time since I've seen battle attire!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ、事態がこのようになれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, now that things have come to this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達もただ静観しているわけにはいきません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we can't just stand by and watch."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私の息子、乱義は成人すればJAPAN盟主となる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "My son, Rangyi, will become the leader of JAPAN once he comes of age.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのため生母である私は、今まで奥での
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Therefore, as his birth mother, I have been engaged in domestic affairs until now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 政-ﾏﾂﾘｺﾞﾄ-に従事しておりましたが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but... (matsurigoto - political/ritual affairs)."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ、やはり私は武人のようです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, after all, I seem to be a warrior."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「妖怪の方々に比べれば微力ではありますが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Compared to the youkai, our strength may be small,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 香姫様に留守を任された少数の兵達も、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the small number of soldiers entrusted by Princess Kaoru to guard the home,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 存分にお使い下さい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: please use them to the fullest."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふっ、万の兵を得た気分だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, it feels like we have ten thousand soldiers."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「守ろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let's protect it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「我らの国を」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Our country."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市地帯を制圧し勢いに乗る魔軍。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army is gaining momentum, having seized control of the free city zone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに対抗するのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Opposing them are,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 主力を大陸に派遣し、わずかな兵力となった残存兵。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the remaining troops, who became a small force after sending the main army to the continent.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「妖怪の方々だけに戦わせるつもりはありませんよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't intend to let only the youkai fight."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「五十六殿」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Gojuuroku."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わあ、戦装束、久しぶりに見ました！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wow, it's been a long time since I've seen battle attire!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ、事態がこのようになれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, now that things have come to this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達もただ静観しているわけにはいきません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we can't just stand by and watch."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私の息子、乱義は成人すればJAPAN盟主となる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "My son, Rangyi, will become the leader of JAPAN once he comes of age.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのため生母である私は、今まで奥での
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Therefore, as his birth mother, I have been engaged in domestic affairs until now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 政-ﾏﾂﾘｺﾞﾄ-に従事しておりましたが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but... (matsurigoto - political/ritual affairs)."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ、やはり私は武人のようです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, after all, I seem to be a warrior."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「妖怪の方々に比べれば微力ではありますが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Compared to the youkai, our strength may be small,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 香姫様に留守を任された少数の兵達も、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the small number of soldiers entrusted by Princess Kaoru to guard the home,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 存分にお使い下さい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: please use them to the fullest."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふっ、万の兵を得た気分だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, it feels like we have ten thousand soldiers."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「守ろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let's protect it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「我らの国を」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Our country."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市地帯を制圧し勢いに乗る魔軍。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army is gaining momentum, having seized control of the free city zone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに対抗するのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Opposing them are,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 主力を大陸に派遣し、わずかな兵力となった残存兵。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the remaining troops, who became a small force after sending the main army to the continent.
